trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The honest alchemist needs help.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the honest alchemist.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the honest alchemist again.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_TODO_02<tab>Retrieve the goods from the water.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the honest alchemist.

TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_001<tab>You've come by at the perfect time, adventurer! Could you help me find someone? One of my colleagues went to receive a delivery and hasn't come back. I'm worried something might have happened...
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_002<tab>Oh, thank you. He went to Yedlihmad, so let's start by looking around the aetheryte there.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_003<tab>I've been asking around about my colleague, and someone claims to have seen him setting out from port in a small boat.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_004<tab>Maybe he loaded the shipment onto it and headed back. In which case, we must have just missed him. I hope that's all that happened...
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_005<tab>Well, let's head back to the Great Work. We should keep an eye on the shoreline on our way back just in case.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST_000_006<tab>Hrrrngh... Mmmurghhh...
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_007<tab>Oh no! His boat must have capsized!
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST_000_008<tab>I... I loaded...everything...on the boat to bring back... But something hit us, and...
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST_000_009<tab>I managed to swim to safety, but the cargo... I'm so sorry...
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_010<tab>Forget the cargo! All that matters is you're all right. We'll just have to do without the sunken goods.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_A1_000_001<tab>Shall I retrieve them for you?
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_A1_000_002<tab>Looks like the perfect opportunity to practice my underwater breathing technique.
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_011<tab>What? You can do that?
TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST_000_012<tab>Thank you... There were five articles in all... Some of them sunk...but some float.

TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_013<tab>I'm sorry to leave all of this to you, but I need to get him home before his condition worsens. We'll head back to the Great Work first, so come meet us when you're done.

TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_014<tab>You made it back! If you're worried about my colleague, he's fine. Just resting after clearing out the water in his lungs. I gave him some chai and he went right to sleep.

TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_015<tab>You managed to retrieve all the lost cargo? Incredible! These are valuable weapons imported from Vylbrand. They just need a few alchemic finishing touches before they're complete.

TEXT_AKTKZA026_04205_HONESTALCHEMIST_000_016<tab>From here, they'll head off to the hands of the Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han warriors to help protect the order. Thank you for everything, adventurer.
